attributes.action: Ban all future bonuses for bank employees  that have been assisted by government funding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For all banks that have opted for assisted government funding sourced by us the taxpayers - there should be a complete ban on bonuses and payrises for the entire period the bank is assisted by taxpayers money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
